title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2022
content:
30th September, 2022 Statutory Instruments 909
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 61 OF 2022
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No.2) Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. The Oder maybe cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No.2) Order, 2022
2. A candidate for election as a council chairperson or Date and
councillor in a district and ward set out in the Schedule shall time of
nomination
lodge a nomination with the Returning Officer on Thursaday,
for election
13th October, 2022, between 09:00 Hours and 15:00 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, Campaign
Thursday, 3rd November, 2022. Period
4. (1) A poll for the election of a council chairperson or Election date
councillor in a district and ward set out in the Schedule shall and time of
poll
take place on Friday, 4th November, 2022, between 06:00 hours
and 18:00 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward set out in
the Schedule if only one candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O.Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka Price K4.00 each
910 Statutory Instruments 30th September, 2022
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph 2 and 4)

D. SIMWINGA,
